mapper.select: select 'chaxun' AS TP,cterm,IS_PROMOTION_FLAG,sum(LOAN_ONLINE) AS LOAN_ONLINE from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where statis_date >= #{beginDate} and statis_date <=#{endDate} and IS_YG = 0 group by cterm,IS_PROMOTION_FLAG union all select 'duibi' AS TP ,cterm,IS_PROMOTION_FLAG,sum(LOAN_ONLINE) AS LOAN_ONLINE from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where statis_date >= #{compareBeginDate} and statis_date <=#{compareEndDate} and IS_YG = 0 group by cterm,IS_PROMOTION_FLAG

select * from (select count(distinct CUST_RXFYG) as cx_rxfyg, count(distinct CUST_YGRXF) as cx_ygrxf, count(distinct CUST_YG) as cx_yg from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_PERMEABILITY_D where FLAG = 2 and statis_date >= #{beginDate} and statis_date <= #{endDate}) a, (select count(distinct CUST_RXFYG) as db_rxfyg, count(distinct CUST_YGRXF) as db_ygrxf, count(distinct CUST_YG) as db_yg from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_PERMEABILITY_D where FLAG = 2 and statis_date >= #{compareBeginDate} and statis_date <= #{compareEndDate}) b

select a.yg_staff, a.cnt as querycnt, b.cnt as comparecnt from (select count(distinct LOAN_ONLINE_CUST) as cnt, YG_STAFF from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where IS_YG = 0 and statis_date >= #{beginDate} and statis_date <= #{endDate} group by YG_STAFF) a left join (select count(distinct LOAN_ONLINE_CUST) as cnt, YG_STAFF from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where IS_YG = 0 and statis_date >= #{compareBeginDate} and statis_date <= #{compareEndDate} group by YG_STAFF) b on a.yg_staff = b.yg_staff

select a.cust_chnl, a.cnt as querycnt, b.cnt as comparecnt from (select count(distinct LOAN_ONLINE_CUST) as cnt, CUST_CHNL from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where IS_YG = 0 and YG_STAFF = 0 and statis_date >= #{beginDate} and statis_date <= #{endDate} group by CUST_CHNL) a left join (select count(distinct LOAN_ONLINE_CUST) as cnt, CUST_CHNL from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where IS_YG = 0 and YG_STAFF = 0 and statis_date >= #{compareBeginDate} and statis_date <= #{compareEndDate} group by CUST_CHNL) b on a.cust_chnl = b.cust_chnl

select a.cust_chnl,a.IS_NEW_FLAG as ISNEW, a.cnt as querycnt, b.cnt as comparecnt from (select count(distinct LOAN_ONLINE_CUST) as cnt, CUST_CHNL,IS_NEW_FLAG from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where IS_YG = 0 and statis_date >= #{beginDate} and statis_date <= #{endDate} group by CUST_CHNL,IS_NEW_FLAG) a left join (select count(distinct LOAN_ONLINE_CUST) as cnt, CUST_CHNL,IS_NEW_FLAG from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_LOAN_D where IS_YG = 0 and statis_date >= #{compareBeginDate} and statis_date <= #{compareEndDate} group by CUST_CHNL,IS_NEW_FLAG) b on a.cust_chnl = b.cust_chnl and a.IS_NEW_FLAG=b.IS_NEW_FLAG

select a.dept_nm, a.BAL_AMT as query_BAL_AMT, a.CFC_PAY_AMT as query_CFC_PAY_AMT, a.PAY_AMT as query_PAY_AMT, b.BAL_AMT as compare_BAL_AMT, b.CFC_PAY_AMT as compare_CFC_PAY_AMT, b.PAY_AMT as compare_PAY_AMT from (select DEPT_NM, sum(BAL_AMT) as BAL_AMT, sum(CFC_PAY_AMT) as CFC_PAY_AMT, sum(PAY_AMT) as PAY_AMT from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_PERMEABILITY_D where FLAG = 2 and statis_date >= #{beginDate} and statis_date <= #{endDate} group by DEPT_NM) a left join (select DEPT_NM, sum(BAL_AMT) as BAL_AMT, sum(CFC_PAY_AMT) as CFC_PAY_AMT, sum(PAY_AMT) as PAY_AMT from cfc_dm.TDM_IA_PERMEABILITY_D where FLAG = 2 and statis_date >= #{compareBeginDate} and statis_date <= #{compareEndDate} group by DEPT_NM) b on a.dept_nm = b.dept_nm
